title: Souykuu no Lapis Lazuli - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Supernatural
author: Asano Hajime   あさの ハジメ
description: Fifty years ago a witch died and left behind what was called the 'Witch's Legacy.' It is now the modern day where it is said that whosoever collects all 99 pieces of the Witch's Legacy or 'Witchcraft' will be granted one wish.>
